General.Name: Stalprodukt SA
General.Description: Stalprodukt S.A., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells processed steel products in Poland. It operates through three segments: Electrical Sheets, Profiles, and Zinc. The company offers cold rolled electrical steel; cold rolled sections, such as closed and open structural profiles; cold and hot rolled sheets, coils, and strips; transformer cores; steel safety barriers; steel structures; electrical transformer sheets; lightning conductors, galvanized wires, and steel tapes; and energy, laboratory, mechanical-construction, transport, hotel, equipment, and forwarding services. It also produces hydrogen, dolomite aggregates, and concentrate; mines and produces non-ferrous metal ores, such as zinc, lead, cadmium, and zinc alloys; produces and regenerates spare parts; installs, repairs, and maintenance machines; and constructs and maintains roads and highways. In addition, the company is involved in the protection of property and persons; and the designing of devices related to the use of renewable energy sources. Further, it exports its products. The company was formerly known as ZPH Stalprodukt S.A. and changed its name to Stalprodukt S.A. in 2005. Stalprodukt S.A. was founded in 1971 and is based in Bochnia, Poland.
